short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to bring Volta experience to GitHub.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Volta extension brings features right inside GitHub:
- Assign status to issues and pull requests
- Set milestones
- Open the issue or repository on Volta
- Read notifications
And much more!
